lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello and welcome, everybody, to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, we're in rare form already, this is bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So get better, buddy, and we'll see you when we come back.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: The polls, not only have I seen the polls, we were just up in Seattle and a lot of people who came by our tables for like an autograph or whatever said they were voting for you, friend, which scared the shit out of me.

lines.text: Thank you, Sam, and thank you everyone who's now debt-free of what they owed Sam Riegel over all these years.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, oh, all you crazy beautiful people, our Vox Machina, Legend of Vox Machina Kickstarter animated series campaign is still running strong! That's my best Sam Riegel impression.

lines.text: Our next and final, really, stretch goal is $8.8 million, and if we hit that, we will be able to complete the series and make ten episodes of The Legend of Vox Machina.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just us and the community. No big companies, nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: Laura, I think you had a quick merch announcement to make?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is what we used in our--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an actual, functional, written language of the Cobalt Soul cipher.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin has been talking about that design for about two years.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and every time I was like, "Is it done?" He's like, "It's almost there." This is worth it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did any of us actually look at it to see what it actually means?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has a bunch of hidden symbolism and stuff in it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wish he was here to explain it all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got a lot of tweets from you guys with our journals that we've released in the past, and a lot of you were like, "Can we have gridded paper? Because I like to make notes of my maps." So I made the back 30% of it gridded paper for people who like to check things out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's in the shop right now, and it's also in the UK store right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Super excited, they've been working on that for a while, so super excited to see that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Enjoy the next two weeks, use that time to relax, use that time to, I don't know, watch other episodes or check out some of the other great streams out there, or get the rest of your family and friends indoctrinated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can finally get that colonic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've been talking that for so long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a team effort tonight, well done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We will never stop doing that. We will never stop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this is my life now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll be at your funeral and we will be--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A very harsh battle ensued in which a number of members of your own party turned against you under the charm effects of these demonic creatures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) At the end of this, all of you lay bruised and beaten, and Caduceus, snuffed, his life lost, if not for the divine magics of Jester and that one diamond you guys have been carrying around for a long time as components, you managed--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we don't have one now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, we bought two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you guys take your long rest, you can set yourselves at a full night's recovery.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would it be better for you to identify it now or after we rest? It's in a language I can't understand, I don't even know if it's a language at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull the book out and I start to Ritual cast Identify.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is before we went to sleep or after?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is before going to sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't tell your morning voice from your just-almost-died voice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, it's a scroll in a different language?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll switch to Comprehend Languages instead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking over it, and based on some of the things you had seen in the tunnel behind you, approaching this space, you gather that this was the next wave of development beneath the city in which a more permanent portal you saw being partially inscribed in the stone of the tunnels as you entered, this is the next wave of instructions that were to be given to essentially the away team that has been here locally.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like how to build a portal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like more and more lines of the inscription runes that were going to be used in the next wave of preparing whatever was going to be the permanent portal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just to clarify, is it instructions to build the portal that we fucked up, or the thing after that portal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like seeing fiendish construction, seeing things that are built or have some sort of an Abyssal influence in their design, what you discovered doesn't seem Abyssal in origin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The scroll doesn't seem Abyssal in origin?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh right, with the mercury in it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That I will take, if we're going to bed, 10 more minutes to-- forget it, I will spend 20 minutes or so to cast Detect Magic on it first, and after that-- well, just Detect Magic first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the disk, there is very much a magical essence to it. Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is the quality of the magic. Which school?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now I will finish the trio and do Identify to see if it is usable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it's serviceable, but probably easily broken.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you saying that, Caleb examining it, I just see a piece of a puzzle and understand its purpose, but there's no specific way for me to use it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just gradually, by its proximity, begins to shred the barrier between the planes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the best piece of evidence we have, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For sure, did that piece of paper say anything? Like...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These things are taking instructions from someone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think it still counts as good evidence if we break it a little? We've got the plans. We've got the rune rubbings, we'd have a, you know, broken artifact.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably not as much, not as impressive as if it's intact.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, in your expert opinion, if that disk thing, if that stays in one place for a while, will it eventually a burrow a hole into the portal into another dimension? Like should we keep moving it around so it doesn't like just stay put and just sort of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm afraid I do not know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a monster coming through to attack us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a monster. That's somebody peeking out of a vagina.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you remember when that nasty thing stuck its head through and it said like, is it ready or is it complete? Like he was asking them if something was being finished.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what those little guys were building, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just wondering how widespread this incursion was planning on being.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How'd the device get here in the first place? Somebody had to put it here, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone had to put it here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We found those dogs or whatever they were in another place entirely here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you check it for fingerprints or anything like that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me get out my CSI dusting kit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you cast a spell to see who held it last?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like who the previous owner was? Do you have any of that in your books?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so I'm going to bed, and I just sort of lie down and collapse on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could cast Zone of Truth on the apparatus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like shouldn't we just move it around a little bit so it can't? Or just, we decided we were going to put it in the box, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to put it in the lead box.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know magic enough to know that we're kosher.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Set it outside the dome a foot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the time you guys come to consciousness it's more than eight hours, just-- oh man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have to keep both of the flasks on the table still, or--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Will you have to drink all of the contents in a single game?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think so. That's what Lyft is for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin is also purring furiously all night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're surrounded by a haphazard motors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do also notice that the corpses of the-- I believe that's four hours of sleep that you did not have the dome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The corpses of the demons you had fought before are now black sludge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other than that, it is a quiet, sore, cold, subterranean morning greeting you in the mid-afternoon under Asarius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, that was a shit string of events.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we go back up top and turn in our findings and get this rescue mission back on track with a favor to boot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, but before we do, maybe we should just, so this doesn't happen again, maybe we should have like a code word with each other, in case you're taken over by another being or something, your mind is controlled, like there's a challenge word and a reply.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And if you don't say that reply, I know you're a bad guy and I kill you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about like octo, and you say--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about ella, and you say--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hairy dog is usually where I would go with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm tryin' here. I'm just coming up with the same shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What happens if the first word is pussy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Basically if you think your friend is mind controlled, say anything to them, and if they don't say pussy back, kill them.

lines.text: Quick point of order, I think if you are charmed or controlled in the same way that our friend Caleb was yesterday, I don't believe you'll be able to say that word, right?

lines.text: Right, I don't think you will.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, the DM is dangerously holding a d20, maybe we should--

lines.text: No, I just, this is just a very pretty die.

lines.text: Caduceus is beat to shit, but slowly conscious, sitting up, in the process of pulling out and like fiddling with some tea, and just looks over and goes, "Oh, hey."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's pretty nice, pretty nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry that I accidentally killed you yesterday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll talk later." (laughter) I don't want to do this moment without Taliesin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to get out of this well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's get up and out, I guess.

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: Before we get out, I'll sidle up next to Caleb and just say hey, how'd that feel yesterday when you were all, you know, launching shit at us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You ever had anything like that happen before?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not like that, like having your faculties overtaken?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I have never been controlled through arcane means before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it feel like you wanted to do it, or did it feel like you wanted to fight it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was actually frightened of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It made me frightened of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you feel better now, you know that we're friends, right? No lingering effects, no PTS...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm me. Check on our big friend over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha currently stretching, getting up and getting the Magician's Judge and sheathing it and standing up, and just been listening in to this conversation and as you all glance over, all eyes cast upon her, she just, "Sorry. Sorry."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, well, you know, it's all water under the bridge, yesterday's events.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It could've happened to any of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll be more prepared next time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't actually have an answer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we might be able to find something that could help with not being so easily swayed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I mean, now that we know, "next time we come across anything like this, "maybe I can try and help out a bit."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The well, the bucket is currently up, it is currently wound up, and you look up through the 15 feet of space before it reaches the surface, and you can see the gray sky ahead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How wide across is the well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about four feet across, I think.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to do the monk Ninja Warrior thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to follow behind her doing the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are like, "Ah," Beau's like, "I got this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's how you do it? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check for you as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your arm span is just wide enough where you can reach the sides, and usually you'd have a hard time keeping the pressure there, but you're pretty beefy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a little longer than Beau, but you do manage to make your way up and out the well through your own physical locomotion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When I get to the top, I want to slowly peek my head up, and look around and see if anyone's watching or how suspicious this looks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was rolling for Yasha, it's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! My ass he's rolling for Yasha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: ♪ Buh buh buh ba bum ♪ ♪ Bum bum bum ba bum ♪ That's a big whisper for a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What the fuck is she seeing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which one of those pictures is older, the left or the right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, you guys get up, Yasha climbs up after you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My butt hits Beau, my head hits Beau's butt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha instinctually hears that and goes, "Sorry." She's been apologizing a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I send the bucket down for the rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well you didn't have to roll for it, you're fine, they were helping.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While they get up, while they climb the rope, I'm just going to say: You guys got it, yeah? Yeah, okay, bye. I grab Jester by the arm and I pull her across the road a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's your thingy, your medallion, your symbol thingy? The Traveler--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance across the street and between two of the buildings there's a hut, like a hut made of stone and a thatched roof, it looks old and weathered, and there is a wooden door and on the door you see, hanging from a metal ring, at first glance it looks like a meal bell, like a dinner bell type thing, but it's a little archway with a little path running through it with the horizon in the center.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push past this heavy pair of oxen that are (groaning) making their way across the street with a cart wheeling behind. You see this large orc that, "Hey!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (reins cracking) and takes the reins and pushes them a little further, you guys move past that as the (squeaking) wheeling continues on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, I saw all of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way to the door, and it's a door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hello, hello, hello, hello, hello, hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (squeaks) Super dark inside, you just see a little bit of spackled gray and brown fur and this big cloudy eye glance through and go, "Hello?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The eye squints a bit and it rotates and goes to the other eye, which is not as cloudy, and goes, "What's that?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you think it is? What is on your door right here, man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is older and not in the best health, and the smell is awful too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that would be some stinky breath.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other hand grabs the doorway and peeks through, the elongated neck of the the gnoll creeping in, looking it over. "Are you a friend of the Traveler?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay! Can Beau come in, too? She's also really cool and she also sort of likes the Traveler sometimes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, well, I follow Jester, and whoever she follows, I follow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm gathering a small army of Traveler followers and she is one of them, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The smell in here is a combination of rotting food, general wet, oily fur, a hint of urine smell, and burned out candles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The candles don't do a good job of covering that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a little rank in your hut.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, I like it, it's wonderful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So why have you come to my house, what you want from me?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you going to tell us a story? You have the posture like you're going to tell us a ghost story.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, mostly I want to know like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sniffing) "Where are you from, huh? "Not many humans hang around in Xhorhas."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I feel like I'm a citizen of the world, you know, I'm not really from any one place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did you meet the Traveler? When did you find him? When did he come to you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Jester after all. What is yours?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When did you find him? When did he come to you? What did he say, you know? What did he look like? Does he have the same cloak that he wears with me or is that like the only thing, or sometimes, you know? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thought it strange that a fair folk would visit "an old codger like myself, but he taught me "to pass the time, you know, pissing off folks with pranks."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Brought some liveliness back into my life "when I was mostly just lonely, "and promised he'd bring some gifts down the road "the more I poked those nearby. (laughs)"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, not yet, you know. I'm just sewing mischief "as much as I can. The old--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Doesn't visit often, not really, "but he was telling me there was "supposed to be some meeting soon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was telling me about the same thing, yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, are you going to go? I mean, I hear it's going to be the biggest rave ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean other than Gimmel who helps at the butcher "you're the only other person I know "who believes me. (nervous chuckle)"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I can totally understand everything you say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He made fun of me for a while, but--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you're thinking of the Gentleman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you don't know who Gimmel is. You haven't run into a Gimmel yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no, he's one of them orcish folks. (snorts) "How'd you come to find him, huh?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, came to see me when I was really young.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you know, years ago. Probably it must be like, oh jeez.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was, you know, like my age when he came to see me, and then we hung out and we were like best friends hanging out for a long time, and then, you know, he got a little older, and I think like more powerful, you know, because he tends to do these sort of things, and then he seemed just to come see me less and less but he still is, you know, super prevalent in my life and stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think if we go to this place in like a year, right, I think that I'm probably going to be like, (clicks tongue) pretty high up in the ranks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've done quite a few deeds in his name."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, do you have, like, a lot of spells from him? Because I totally do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I brought a person back to life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've shat in at least four of the wells "of this city." (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I smelled something when we went down there, I think that might be--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it makes so much more sense.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was like, why does the water smell like this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take out my paintbrush of magic stuff and I'm going to paint a little Traveler figurine for him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're welcome. You can pray to that whenever you feel the need to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(groans)" Carefully gets up and lumbers across the chamber and sets it on just this makeshift table that's barely functional for a creature of his size, and sits and admires it, his body half-cocked to one side the way he holds his weight and goes, "Yeah. (chuckles)"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How'd you come to know the Traveler, huh?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's still very new. It's really Jester here that introduced me to him, and haven't been visited yet, personally, didn't know if he was real or not until this just happened, so mind's a little bit blown, but I'm hopeful, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, I'm really excited about this gathering, "I don't get to meet a lot of other folks "and most just think I'm a bit crazy, you know?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't even know there were other people and then we were in this one place and I found these tokens that were, like, his symbol, you know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, so somebody had to have left them there, so there's got to be a few more of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're supposed to bring as many people as you can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, there's only a few more months "of time until, oh goodness--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Few more months? Wait, what was that date? I mean, I know, I remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He just said Unndilar, more to come, so mysterious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope you don't die before it happens because that would really suck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's old for a gnoll? Is that rude to ask?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How far away is this place?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought he gave me a place.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: There doors where you came through open, and Lythir steps in as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards are still waiting there on the outside, and he just stands, finds one of the nearby benches, and stands next to it, doesn't even sit, but just quietly keeps watch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you here to talk to the Bright Queen about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How crazy is it that there was a fucking rift to the Abyssal plane, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is an ancient construct, but not. I'm confused by it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not-- what do you mean it wasn't ancient?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Meaning the materials were more recently cobbled."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh really? Do you think somebody built it within the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know if it was in the city, "but it's been within this age at the very least."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Weeks, months, (sighs) the shape and design of it "seems to have seen little wear and tear."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it did seem pretty new.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These happenings, are they limited to the City of Beasts, or has it been happening all over the Dynasty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have not been privy to such discussions, so."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you might be seeing more of the Dynasty soon after you get transferred away, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Too many beasts, not enough beasts?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I believe we've asked enough questions of myself, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He narrows his eyes very intently towards you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever tried baked goods with cinnamon in them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will keep this in mind next time I have the option "of enjoying this cinnamon." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Watch, I can say 13-44-16. What I say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're doing that. We're doing that thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sitting on the bench already, so I just lift up my feet and wait for her to get down there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I bend down and I say, I'm going to fuckin' get you outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is a very interesting punishment "for imperial dogs."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not so much a punishment as it is an honor for them. Caleb, why don't you come over here and make sure my boots are looking clean for the Bright Queen, will ya?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take a very filthy rag out of my pocket and I start to buff his shoe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes "(chuckling) "Well, you've certainly learned how to pass the time."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you hear some footsteps approaching from the other larger doors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I ask you to tell me of these deeds."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are the members of the Mighty Nein.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A group of adventurers and investigators who have recently helped your Lady...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, they were having an issue because a lot of like fiends and monsters were coming out into the city and also some people were being like mind-controlled and they were acting very weird and stuff, so we, you know, took care of that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We recovered an artifact which we brought to Lady Olios.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We only apologize that it took us an entire day to solve this problem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we had to wait until the dead of night, when one of the citizens of the town was being molested by evil mind-controlling succubuses and incubuses. (aside) That's what they're called.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One's a boy and one's a girl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and they, yeah, they were making him visualize like really sexy bugbears, like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't need to get into the details, but it was devastating for your people until we stepped in and put an end to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We saw them, we fought them, we followed them down to their lair, where we drew them out and then closed the rift, and upon closing the rift and killing the creatures, we found the artifact that was causing it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but I was making it sound cooler.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See if it was cool? Cool check, cool check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (high-pitched noises) Persuasion! What do I got here? 10.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Money is not as important to us as a favor would be in our time of need.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Might I ask, what are your origins? "You act with an air that is unique in Xhorhas, "especially during these trying times.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We all have different origins, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We came together on the seas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you are indeed to have my favor, "what would you wish of me? "What calls your deeds done that such threats "to your own lives pre-consecution?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We believe that he has done some experiments which have wreaked havoc in other parts of the world, and caused people great suffering, and as part of our mission we are to find out what he knows and possibly use his information to heal some of the people who are affected by his experiments.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were asked to find him and return him so that he may be punished by the people there, but we know he is in your custody, so we understand if that's not possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like both of you to make Deception checks, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still not great with my negative three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A voice comes out from the side, the left side of you, amongst the thrones that goes, "My queen, if I could speak."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I myself still recover from wounds "suffered along the western edges of the Ashkeeper Mountains "not a week before."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we did fight with some of your soldiers upon crossing into the Dynasty, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we're not soldiers of the Empire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were trying to make our way to the City of Beasts, which we successfully did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a Persuasion check with disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got this. You got this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am curious why you would walk into my sanctum."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have you nothing to say for yourselves?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, wait! We have not been honest with you, it's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Guards." I'm going to go ahead-- be back in a moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you doing, where are you going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's getting a map. He's getting a map!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are going to go into combat, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know. It's up to you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are not going to fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like all of the rough rolls, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We fucked up in not recognizing--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys fighting or are you surrendering?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we going to do, fight you guys? You guys are super powerful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't work for the Empire! Please!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards all approach, stepping up to the sides, here behind, and here, and here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What should we do? Quick, say something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to tell them the truth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have come a long way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just get arrested, man. Just get arrested.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha's currently being put into shackles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wildemount is working against you and we have brought the proof, if you will allow me to show it to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Zythier across the way goes, "What proof?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean no harm. I need to remove something from--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy, this went perfectly in my head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anything strange and I take off your head."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester, I'm coming to you, okay? I am just going to open this bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can feel the sweat beads forming and dripping down your forehead and gathering on your brow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I reach in and grab the dodecahedron.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And lift it into the air.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought you were going to get out the tripod first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see every eye upon you, and the queen, the Bright Queen herself Leylas Kryn, has stepped around the art object, the symbol that sits before her throne and looks down straight into it, her eyes wide, you see tears forming at the corners of her face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I set it down in front of Jester, two or three feet in front of her feet and raise my hands back into the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus it's a fun moment to finish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's right, we're taking next week off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because he did say that he was going to like Rosohna, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We never even got to try it with the tripod.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can give her the tripod, too, and just you know, tell her--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've got a lot to think about over these next two weeks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've returned the beacon to the Kryn, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So are they super powerful now and they're going to-- oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What have we got to lose?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We gave the nuke to the bad guys! Bad guys? Are they good guys?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the Empire good guys? Is there a way to lose Dungeons & Dragons other than a TPK?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We gave somebody a nuke, oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you might be in a position to learn a lot more about the dynamics of the world larger than you now that you've made a very huge ally very quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, this is going to be real interesting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got two weeks to think about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Us, no longer safe for us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As far as they know, someone broke into the tower and took it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They didn't know that we took it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sadly no combat, but at least you get to see the throne room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How would we even survive that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did we use the new cameras?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm not saying that you would've survived at the very least, but I'm just, going off of our previous experiences, sometimes, I don't know what you guys are going to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I knew it was a possibility you'd surrender, I knew it was a possibility you'd try and be like fuck this, I'm going to get out and make a crazy escape! Then it would've, but fuck, that was--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ride or die, bitches. Ride or die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and your Insight check wasn't high enough to get more information about his response to you when you guys had entered the chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also legitimately, for all we knew we were about to be murdered on the spot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let me go home and rewrite some stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've got some prep to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back the 4th of April, I believe. April 4th.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, enjoy your time off, we'll enjoy ours, and as always, we love you very much, and is it Thursday yet? Good night.
